name: vivliostyle-book-template
description: One-command build template for Markdown -> Vivliostyle PDF/HTML with GitHub Actions CI

scripts.build:html: node --preserve-symlinks node_modules/@vivliostyle/cli/dist/cli.js build --config vivliostyle.config.js --output dist/site && mv dist/site/manuscript.html dist/site/index.html && touch dist/site/.nojekyll
scripts.build: npm run build:pdf && npm run build:html
